original_title: New tax on imported coconut oil from next week
original_body_lines: The government has decided to impose a new tax on imported coconut oil from next week, Finance State Minister Ranjith Siyambalapitiya said.
While addressing a meeting in Ruwanwella this evening, he said the decision was taken to protect the local coconut oil manufacturers.
Accordigly, a discussion was held to impose Rs. 25 for a litre of imported coconut oil. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
